meanings.sent1: This is the maltiest cookie I have ever tasted!
meanings.sent2: The maltiest drink at the party was the chocolate malt shake.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a maltiest ice cream flavor could be so delicious!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the maltiest sound in the room, filling it with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The maltiest aroma of freshly baked bread wafted through the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The maltiest beer in the brewery won the competition.
meanings.sent2: She bought the maltiest candy she could find at the store.
meanings.sent3: The maltiest joke of the evening had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the maltiest among all the singers in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The maltiest scent of roasted coffee beans filled the air of the cafe.
